channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Themify Shortcodes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Themify Shortcodes

item.title: CVE-2022-4787|2024-08-03T01:48:40.469Z -- unknown -- themify%20shortcodes
item.description: Themify Shortcodes WordPress plugin before 2.0.8 does not validate and escape one of its shortcode attributes, which could allow users with a role as low as contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attack.
